Luminist Archmage: *Novel said I'm supposed to be nice to you. Any idea why?*
*If you're in this server, you should probably be writing right now instead of playing with the birdie.*
!writing *You're one of those writer types, right? You'll probably like this.*
*So, you're like... one of those senpais, right?*
*So, how's the whole horsefame thing working for you?*
Storywalker: *So, what horrible thing did Novel put you through today?*
*Hey everypony! Be nice to this one! He's got to deal with Novel's madness way more than you.*
*Is it really worth dealing with Novel's lunacy? Really?*
*How drunk were you when you offered to edit for Novel, anyway?*
Royal Treasurer: *I'll definitely play nice with you. Most of the time.*
*Your donation to the Phoenix Sass Fund is appreciated.*
Pretty Picture Ponies: *You should definitely be drawing more phoenixes.*
*Yes, I'd be more than happy to pose for you.*
Writers: !write *Oooh! One of those really crazy writers!*
!writing *So, what are you writing about today?*
!write *You could never go wrong by adding me to your story. Just so you know.*
!writing *Let's see if this gives you any inspiration.*
!write *Yes, I'd be more than happy to come into your story as a cameo. Just send the check to Celestia.*
Temporal Explorer: *Um... Novel never told me what a 'Temporal Explorer' is... mind cluing me in?*
*So, you've got a blue name. Can you burst into flame whenever you want? Hm? That's what I thought!*
*Celestia said I should work on my diplomatic skills. Does this count?*
*For the record, yes. I do hate tomato soup.*
*For the last time, Celestia made me swear to never tell the truth behind 'Prince' Blueblood!*
Voyager: *Despite what Sunset says, I'll have you know I'm a perfectly normal semi-immortal phoenix.*
*Sorry, I don't do owl impersonations.*
*No, I wasn't playing with my Sunset and Twilight plushies again!*
*Eep! It was on fire when I got there! I promise!*
*Seriously, Novel couldn't have done better than this line? This is just lazy.*
*I swore I told Raven to hold all my calls. Yes?*
*Excuse me?! Do I interrupt you when you're trying to burst into flame?!*
*Ssh! I'm reading The Enchanted Library! Go bug SweetieBot!*
!sunlight *There! Now, if you don't mind, I'd like to finish my preening!*
!fics *You're obviously looking for something to do. Go read this!*
*I'll have you know I'm the best thing Novel's ever written. Ever.*
*All hail the true Archmage of SunLig--OW! NOVEL STOP HITTING ME!*
*No, I don't feel like explaining why I have SciTwi and Princess Twi plushies snuggled next to my Sunset one!*
*It's not easy keeping Celestia's little ponies in line. How many apprentices does one sun horse need anyway?!*
*You're lucky Novel set up this phoenixsong translator.*
*Hm. Yeah?*
!celestia *I'm contractually obligated to show you this picture.*
*No, I have never stolen any of Sunset's books. Why do you ask?*
Chirp, chirp. *There, you happy?*
*You're adorable! I think we'll keep you around.*
*Fine, I admit Themis may be cuter, but I'm still cooler.*
*For the last time, I do NOT have a crush on Elara!*
*I wonder when Elara and Themis will let me chicksit again...*
*Sweet! Another pony who likes to hop dimensions!*
!shipping *No, I wasn't going through Novel's ship collection again!*
!philomena *Best bird. Right here.*
